item.title: By: Danel Becker
item.dc:creator: Danel Becker
item.description: It was a great event. I can't decide which was better: The speakers or meeting all the Irish crew.
item.content:encoded: It was a great event. I can’t decide which was better: The speakers or meeting all the Irish crew.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description:
Ryan and the gang delivered a fantastic event. I'm still buzzing and still grinning to myself about some of the highlights.
It was also the only time in my life that I walked up to a bouncer at a velvet rope in front of a nightclub, whispered "Future of Web Apps" and was let it!
item.content:encoded:
Ryan and the gang delivered a fantastic event. I’m still buzzing and still grinning to myself about some of the highlights.

It was also the only time in my life that I walked up to a bouncer at a velvet rope in front of a nightclub, whispered “Future of Web Apps” and was let it!
